text:
have y’all heard of/used this tool before? it seems like it would be really useful for testing the robot in a physics based environment between cad and building the robot, i’ve been messing with xRC simulator but there isn’t a way to import your own cad designs unfortunately and they pointed me to this tool as a way to use it, we could probably test out our current robot design in it since it’s easily integratable with fusion
<https://synthesis.autodesk.com/download.html>

elements.text: have y’all heard of/used this tool before? it seems like it would be really useful for testing the robot in a physics based environment between cad and building the robot, i’ve been messing with xRC simulator but there isn’t a way to import your own cad designs unfortunately and they pointed me to this tool as a way to use it, we could probably test out our current robot design in it since it’s easily integratable with fusion

text: xrc sim is what gluten free dedicated their time to creating instead of FTC after their rover ruckus run
